head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MARSH, CHARLES ODELL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MARSH, CHARLES ODELL

block.p: MARSH-Charles Odell. On August 9, 2000. Beloved son of Margaret Hamilton Patrowich and the late Charles Odell Marsh. Loving brother of Dr. Anna Catherine Gilliam-Ballard. Survived by many loving relatives in South Carolina. Cherished companion of Gayle Rhoda Kurtz. Visitation Saturday, 4-6PM John Krtil Funeral HomeYorkville Funeral Service Inc., 1297 1st Ave, NYC. Interment South Carolina. Charles was associated with the International Center of Photography for many years and was also a talented, freelance artist. He will be missed by all who knew and loved him.
